About me: I'm a DevOps and Automation Engineer with 8 years of work experience. I expertise in creating, configuring, and managing entire CI-CD lifecycle and help teams design and implement git branching strategies, continuous monitoring, and continuous feedback. I have good grasp of Azure cloud and cloud offerings: IaaS, SaaS, PaaS. etc. My immediate goals are to master Containerization using industry leading solutions like Docker and Kubernetes.
